column2: Yet to my irritated ear an anodyne so sweet
column4: Is entombed so still that only to the ear of God its doom is audible
column5: I've heard it in the chillest land
column7: Anecdotes of air in dungeons have sometimes proved deadly sweet!

column22: My country need not change her gown, her triple suit as sweet as when ‘t was cut at Lexington, and first pronounced “a fit.”

column30: Victory comes late, and is held low to freezing lips too rapt with frost to take it. How sweet it would have tasted, just a drop!
column31: How orderly the kitchen ‘d look by night, with just a clock,--
